qas.question: What sort of considerations does architectural design take into account?

answers.text: functional, technical, social, environmental and aesthetic

qas.question: In architecture what aspects are planned and designed?
Aside from planning and design what other types of aspects does architecture involve?

plausible_answers.text: functional, technical, social, environmental and aesthetic considerations

qas.question: What sort of considerations does architectural design never take into account?
In architecture what aspects are never planned and designed?
Aside from planning and design what other types of aspects does architecture never involve?

context: Architecture has to do with planning and designing <a1_0><b4_0>form, space and ambience<b4_0/><a1_0/> to reflect <a0_0><b3_0>functional, technical, social, environmental and <b5_0>aesthetic<a0_0/> considerations<b5_0/><b3_0/>. It requires the creative manipulation and coordination of materials and technology, and of light and shadow. Often, conflicting requirements must be resolved. The practice of Architecture also encompasses the <a2_0>pragmatic aspects<a2_0/> of realizing buildings and structures, including scheduling, cost estimation and construction administration. Documentation produced by architects, typically drawings, plans and technical specifications, defines the structure and/or behavior of a building or other kind of system that is to be or has been constructed.
